whereas there is a clear tradition (may allah bless him and give peace) that says the upper hand better than lower because gives while one takes exists saying of holy prophet (saws) taker giver although renowned hadith (peace be upon him) means (pbuh) underhand an evident above below giving taking however (saaw) since begging being where as in hadis(saleallah huwa salam) preaches instead down peoples are greater god them meaning
